page.title: 16Jehovah's Witnesses in Calne
page.content: My name is Lynsey Mogan.I live in Calne.I am a Jehovah's Witness.We believe the whole of the Holy Bible, and try to get to know what the Bible says,so that we can practice things that God says. We go to meetings at the Calne Scouts Hall for two hours on a Sunday, to hear a talk on the Bible.Also we study an article from the "Watchtower" magazine, which explains the Scriptures. On Thursday nights we have a meeting that helps us to know how to tell others about Jehovah. That is called the Kingdom Ministry School. Every six or seven months we give a five minute talk on a subject like "What is God's name?".Also Brothers read from the Bible and explain it to us.
